Title: Metropia
Writer: Truls Andersen (dramaturge), Fredrik Edin (idea), Fredrik Edin (screenplay), Martin Hultman (idea), Stig Larsson (screenplay), Tarik Saleh (idea), Tarik Saleh (screenplay)
Actors: Vincent Gallo, Juliette Lewis, Udo Kier, Stellan Skarsgård
Plot: In the near future, oil reserves are nearly depleted and Europe is connected by series of underground tunnels. While navigating these tunnels, Roger hears voices, one in particular. Seeking a way to rid himself of the voice only leads Roger deeper into a bizarre conspiracy of control - mind and body.
Production: Zentropa Entertainments, Sveriges Television, Atmo Media Network, Sandrew Metronome, Film i Väst, Tordenfilm AS
